    implicit none

    integer :: n, array(100000), i, even_count, odd_count, even_ind, odd_ind, A, B, answer, sqrt_n, temp, count, k, current

            odd_ind = i

        do while (mod(temp_val, i) == 0)

            count = count +1

            temp_val = temp_val / i

        if (count >0) then

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, array(100000), i, even_count, odd_count, even_ind, odd_ind, A, B, answer, sqrt_n, temp, count, k, current, temp_val

    ! First program's part

    read *, n

    read *, (array(i), i=1,n)

    even_count = 0

    odd_count = 0

    even_ind = 0

    odd_ind = 0

    do i = 1, n

        if (mod(array(i), 2) == 0) then

            even_count = even_count +1

            even_ind = i

        else

            odd_count = odd_count +1

            odd_ind = i

        end if

    end do

    if (odd_count > even_count) then

        A = even_ind

    else

        A = odd_ind

    end if

    ! Second program's part

    if (A == 1) then

        B = 0

    else

        B = 1

    end if

    ! Third program's part

    answer = 0

    temp = B

    sqrt_n = int(sqrt(real(temp)))

    do i = 2, sqrt_n

        count = 0

        temp_val = temp

        do while (mod(temp_val, i) == 0)

            count = count +1

            temp_val = temp_val / i

        end do

        if (count >0) then

            k = 0

            current = 0

            do while (current + (k+1) <= count)

                k = k +1

                current = current +k

            end do

            answer = answer +k

        end if

        temp = temp_val

    end do

    if (temp >1) then

        answer = answer +1

    end if

    print *, answer

end program main
